title: Typeface to go with Pluto Sans
content:
I am interested in hearing your opinion! I work on my own, so I am hoping you can give me some other perspectives.  
What typeface would you advocate using to accompany Pluto Sans as body text?

I will truly appreciate advice on this.

Thanks—in advance.
author: Bundlebrat

comments.content:
Maybe this: [http://ernestinefont.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000245/http:/ernestinefont.com/ "http://ernestinefont.com/")  
(Disclaimer: I had a hand in it.)

hhp

Oh, that is a very pretty typeface! I like it. Although a little too display for body copy for my purposes. But I will keep it in mind for a future project. No nice. Nice work. Thank you for the recommendation.

I think I asked my question in a confusing way, now that I read it again. Darn.

What can typeface can I use as body text when Pluto is the display?

Ernestine is more texty the smaller you get. It's actually surprisingly readable at 4 point!

Hopefully you'll get some better recommendations though.

hhp
I second hrant. It seems to fit quite nicely.
